pathAssistantSteps.info:
Patient must sign Patient Agreement and sign up to an OptiMale plan.

Send plan link from Zoho.

At least 1 recent Blood Test is required showing low testosterone.

Date of Birth must be captured correctly at this stage in DD/MM/YYYY format.

Capture Medical History.

Referred to Doctor for Consultation.

Patient is fully on-boarded.

Order injection supplies if required.

Order medications from pharmacy and check that letterbox delivery is OK.

Completed ADAM Questionnaire is desirable but not essential.

Email address is important at this stage.

Mobile number is desirable but not essential.
